title: colorful arches, hammocks and mirrors shape up modular installation in riga’s dome square
description: dome next door by toms kampars forms an adaptable timber grid crafted from locally sourced, sustainable materials. The post colorful arches, hammocks and mirrors shape up modular installation in riga’s dome square appeared first on designboom | architecture & design magazine.
categories: wood and timber architecture and design
excerpt: toms kampars studio introduces dome next door, a modular installation to riga’s dome square, transforming the site into a playful social hub.
